title: WATCH: A look inside Europe's only coffee plantation
text:
It is no secret that Europeans love a good cup of coffee. Yet, there is only one coffee plantation on the continent.

READ: Bean there, done that: Bespoke coffee destinations all caffeine addicts should check off their list

People have been growing coffee in Gran Canaria's Valle de Agaete on the Canary Islands since the 19th century. The humid climate and fertile soil are perfect for coffee cultivation.

To learn more, watch the video above.
